select bill.fid as id,bill.FControlUnitID as orgId,bu.FNAME_L2 as orgName, bill.FBOOKEDDATE as bizDate,bill.FNUMBER as num,bill.FSTATE as state,bill.FNAME as title, bill.FCREATORID as creatorId,u.FNAME_L2 as creatorName,bill.FCURPROJECTID as projectId, cp.FNAME_L2 as projectName,con.FNUMBER as contractNumber,con.FNAME as contractName, bill.FSUPPLIERID as supplierId,sup.FNAME_L2 as supplierName,bill.FCURRENCYID as currencyId, cur.FNAME_L2 as currencyName,bill.FAMOUNT as amount,bill.FORIGINALAMOUNT as oriAmount, bill.FRECBANK as recBank,bill.FRECACCOUNT as recAccount,bill.FUSAGE as remark, pt.FNAME_L2 as paymentTypeName,bill.FAUDITORID as auditorId,u1.FNAME_L2 as auditorName, bill.FAUDITTIME auditTime,bill.FCREATETIME createTime, (select count(ass.fid) from T_BAS_BoAttchAsso ass where ass.FBOID=bill.fid) as attNums from T_CON_PayRequestBill bill left join t_pm_user u on u.fid=bill.FCREATORID left join t_pm_user u1 on u1.fid=bill.FAUDITORID left join T_FDC_PaymentType pt on pt.fid=bill.FPAYMENTTYPE left join T_FDC_CurProject cp on cp.fid=bill.FCURPROJECTID left join T_CON_CONTRACTBILL con on con.fid=bill.FCONTRACTID left join T_BD_Supplier sup on sup.fid=bill.FSUPPLIERID left join T_BD_CURRENCY cur on cur.fid=bill.FCURRENCYID left join T_ORG_BASEUNIT bu on bu.fid=bill.FCONTROLUNITID left join t_bd_person p on p.fid=bill.FApplierId
cp.FFULLORGUNIT=#{orgId} and bill.FSource='0D6DD1F4'
and bill.FNAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and bill.FNUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and con.FNUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contractNumber}),'%')
and con.FNAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contractName}),'%')
and sup.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{supplierName}),'%')
and cp.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{projectName}),'%')
and #{bookDate} < bill.FBOOKEDDATE and bill.FBOOKEDDATE <= #{bizDate}
and u.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{creatorName}),'%')
and bill.fstate like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{state}),'%')
and u.fnumber =#{authorNum} or p.fnumber =#{authorNum}
and bill.FCURPROJECTID in
#{item}
order by bill.FBOOKEDDATE desc,bill.fnumber desc

select bill.fid as id,bill.FCONTROLUNITID as orgId,bu.FNAME_L2 as orgName, bill.FBOOKEDDATE as bizDate,bill.FNUMBER as num,bill.FSTATE as state,bill.FNAME as title, bill.FCREATORID as creatorId,u.FNAME_L2 as creatorName,bill.FCURPROJECTID as projectId, bill.FCONTRACTID as contractId,bill.FSOURCEFUNCTION as sourceFunction, cp.FNAME_L2 as projectName,con.FNUMBER as contractNumber,con.FNAME as contractName, bill.FSUPPLIERID as realSupplierId,sup.FNAME_L2 as realSupplierName,bill.FCURRENCYID as currencyId, cur.FNAME_L2 as currencyName,bill.FAMOUNT as amount,bill.FORIGINALAMOUNT as oriAmount, bill.FRECBANK as recBank,bill.FRECACCOUNT as recAccount,bill.FUSAGE as remark, pt.FNAME_L2 as paymentTypeName,bill.FAUDITORID as auditorId,u1.FNAME_L2 as auditorName, bill.FAUDITTIME auditTime,bill.FCREATETIME creatTime,bill.FRealSupplierID as supplierId, sup1.FNAME_L2 as supplierName, st.FNAME_L2 as settleMentTypeName, bill.FPAYCONTENTTYPEID as payContentTypeId,pc.FNAME_L2 as payContentTypeName, bill.FPAYDATE as payDate,con.FSTARTDATE as startDate,con.FENDDATE as endDate, con.FTAXERQUA as taxerQua,con.FTAXERNUM as taxerNum,bank.FNUMBER as unionBankNum, con.FSTARTDATE as startDate,con.FENDDATE as endDate, bill.FEXCHANGERATE as exRate,bill.FGRTAMOUNT as grtAmount,bill.FApplierId as applierId, per.FNAME_L2 as applierName,ad.FNAME_L2 as useDepartMentName, com.FNAME_L2 as costCompanyName,cen.FNAME_L2 as costDeptName, con.forgtype as orgType,con.FISJT as isJT,bill.FCOMPLETEPRJAMT as thisAMT, con.FSETTLEAMT as settleAMT,bill.FDESCRIPTION as remark,bill.FLATESTPRICE as latestPrice, bill.FIsDifferPlace, case when bill.FIsDifferPlace=0 then '同城' when bill.FIsDifferPlace=1 then '异地' end isDifPlace, bill.FUrentDegree, case when bill.FUrentDegree=1 then '普通' when bill.FUrentDegree=2 then '加急' end urtDegree, en.FREQUESTAMOUNT as applyAMT,et.FNAME_L2 as costType,bill.FISPAY as isPay from T_CON_PayRequestBill bill left join T_CON_PayRequestBillBgEntry en on en.FHEADID=bill.fid left join T_BC_EXPENSETYPE et on et.fid=en.FEXPENSETYPEID left join t_pm_user u on u.fid=bill.FCREATORID left join t_pm_user u1 on u1.fid=bill.FAUDITORID left join T_FDC_PaymentType pt on pt.fid=bill.FPAYMENTTYPE left join T_FDC_CurProject cp on cp.fid=bill.FCURPROJECTID left join T_CON_CONTRACTBILL con on con.fid=bill.FCONTRACTID left join T_BD_Supplier sup on sup.fid=bill.FSUPPLIERID left join T_BD_Supplier sup1 on sup1.fid=bill.FRealSupplierID left join T_BD_CURRENCY cur on cur.fid=bill.FCURRENCYID left join T_CON_PayContentType pc on pc.fid=bill.FPAYCONTENTTYPEID left join T_CON_BankNum bank on bank.fid=bill.FLXNUMID left join T_BD_SettlementType st on st.fid=bill.FSETTLEMENTTYPEID left join T_BD_Person per on per.fid=bill.FApplierId left join T_ORG_Admin ad on ad.fid=bill.FUseDepartmentID left join T_ORG_CostCenter cen on cen.fid=bill.FCOSTEDDEPTID left join T_ORG_Company com on com.fid=bill.FCostedCompanyId left join T_ORG_BASEUNIT bu on bu.fid=bill.FCONTROLUNITID where bill.fid=#{id}
